alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 3:42PM EDT until August 29 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cattaraugus County in western New York... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 341 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of Allegany State Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Olean, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Ashford, Allegany, Franklinville, St. Bonaventure, Yorkshire, Great Valley and Carrollton. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 17 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
